data.text: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree,
Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will
Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for
Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for
And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from
And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord
